item.title: Automate Personal License Activation in Unity CI
item.author: Jen-Chieh Shen
item.description: Following up the thread, My disappointing experience using Unity in a CI pipeline is also the biggest obstacle for me as well. Personal license (free version) of Unity will expire in a period of time depends on your region. The licensing system from Unity is partially contradict to the CI/CD concept since it will force the user to update their secret UNITY_LICENSE on their GitHub Actions. (Notice this does not apply to Plus/Pro users because they use a different licensing system!) ðŸ˜–
